contextId.information: Yahweh adds this phrase in the middle of another sentence to express that the punishment of Edom is shocking. AT: "ah, you are completely destroyed." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
"'On that day,' says Yahweh, 'I surely will destroy ... mountain of Esau." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
contextId.quote: Will I not on that day," says Yahweh, "destroy ... mountain of Esau?
